data.title: Very tasty lunch
data.text: Sometimes the best dishes are the simple things done well. Burger Barn has delivered that for me now on two lunch visits. The exterior is plain, a walk-up window. Seating is outside only under a covered patio. Both visits have found many folks on their lunch breaks in the seating. Not far from my work, I have placed to-go orders in person and both were very good. Cheeseburger, fries, and tea, but the flavors were quite good. Nothing fancy, don't come looking for it. But if you want a burger with a great taste with good fries, swing by for lunch.

data.title: Good burger
data.text: Went there after hearing so much about it. Not the great burger I was looking for. It was good   Just didn't have the wow factor that everyone was telling me it had. I did have the strawberry shortcake and it was great. Will go back and try something else.

data.title: yum yum
data.text: this is another hidden gem in jackson tn, good food, good service, quick and easy ordering. will be back for great food.

data.title: A Jackson Staple
data.text: The Burger Barn is one of the last of its kind, a true drive up restaurant. I've been enjoying the food here since I was a kid. It's still a place I enjoy sharing with my family. Make sure to try the milkshakes!

data.title: Best Chili dogs
data.text: They have the best chili dogs (with slaw) in West Tennessee.  GREAT Burgers also, their service is quick and easy.  Only problem is that it is a small building and LOTS OF CUSTOMERS, espically at lunch.

data.title: Great burgers and slaw dogs!
data.text: I find myself looking for a reason to go to burger barn. Their double cheeseburger is fabulous. The slaw dogs are heavenly. Their milkshakes are home made!

data.title: Good burgers : Bad Location
data.text: The food here is good for a small drive up type place, but isn't in a good location in town in my opinion. I wouldn't  recommend for people visiting from out of town

data.title: I love this place.
data.text: It's kind of out of the way, but when I'm in the east downtown area, I like to catch lunch there.  Their burgers and fries are always great!  Good, consistent quality!  Service can be just a little bit slow sometimes, but it's worth the wait.

data.title: Love Burger Barn!!
data.text: I've lived in Jackson all my life and if I'm craving a burger, I go to Burger Barn! Cheap, fun atmosphere, quick service, and delicious. Everything from their burgers and fries to milkshakes and pie. Delicious!!

data.title: Best Burgers
data.text: Old fashioned burgers with REAL french fries  Good to pick up and take with you  Quick service usually

data.title: Dunno what happened
data.text: Visited this place back in June after driving by many times over course of a year.  It was pretty good ( though some of the clientele are kinda ehhh - they don't bother you... ).   Went back several times because food was really good and price was very nice... Avg cost of full meal is 5.00 and it's a lot of food.   Went back about 2 weeks ago and the food was nasty.... Old fries, overprocessed burger, just was not good experience....... The only thing different was we stopped by on a Saturday when in the past it's been a weekday... So, I would definately only go on a weekday based on my experience.   I feel this place is avg. due to the inconsistency.
